title: "According to Ququroon, the 5.8 PBE cycle contains the last set of champion texture rebalances."

replies.body: Well if she not getting a texture rebalanced, then that means a Visual Update.
Don't get your hopes up too high there skipper.
They did mention her having a lot of assets ready for a MTU a few months ago. ^^

Wait,they did?
Where is this info so I can go find it.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/Y4c5ZVBy-will-miss-fortunes-in-game-model-ever-be-updated?comment=0000 :)
I found the info,thanks :D

Given that recent textures all have faded colors in order to get along with the new Rift's pastel aesthetics, I suspect giving her a TU would turn her licorice hair into washed out licorice hair. :/

I love MF and would love her to get some attention, but her current model is so disastrously ugly that I'm not sure new textures would improve it. I'd rather wait for her to get a full-scale VU.
Actually, given how old she is, she actually still holds up pretty well, it's just her hair that's really bad.

No, she really doesn't. Even if you discount her hair, her lower body is so badly modeled that her legs clip into her crotch when she crouches during the Ult, her breasts look more like watermelons glued onto her front and her wrist cuffs are strangely square-shaped. On top of it all, her animations are *very* primitive.

Sure, she's not as bad as Poppy and Taric, but she's still in pretty bad shape. She needs a full VU, not just textures.

I just saw Lux's texture update and it looks great! It's sad Miss Fortune isn't getting the same treatment. I have 6 skins for her and it would be nice if each of them get a proper texture update of some sort.
I feel like they are going to give her a small VU and give us luscious smooth hair.
{{champion:83}}

Let's see....VUs

Karma........above average VU
* Very generic appearance and gameplay*
Sion.......flawed
* Arrogantly changed too much: No cryptic gaze
 VO horrible*
Trundle.......below average
* Made into generic lump of walking meat. 'he lives in ice let's make him blue'*

:|

Karthus.....average
*Looks pretty much exactly the same as before, arguable less dramatic*
Tristana.....mixed like Sion
*arguably animations over done.pin feet<>pizza feet*
*too big in size*

> [{quoted}](name=catraven,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=It9EW3pA,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2015-04-12T06:32:53.125+0000)
>
> Karthus.....average
> *Looks pretty much exactly the same as before, arguable less dramatic*
> Tristana.....mixed like Sion
> *arguably animations over done.pin feet<>pizza feet*
> *too big in size*

You're such an asshole because of your opinions on Karthus VU. It's probably the best VU riot ever made. You can't like concept, or model, or skill effect but you can't say he is same. It's easily can be seen that they worked on him a lot.

> You're such an asshole because of your opinions on Karthus VU. It's probably the best VU riot ever made. You can't like concept, or model, or skill effect but you can't say he is same. It's easily can be seen that they worked on him a lot.

K well I don't have the champ so it's an impression. You can be dismissive of that point if you want.
Anivia?
Asked ququroon about it on twitter and he said he is investigating her now but she wasn't originally slated to be retextured.
Wasn't their original statement that all champions would be getting one? Even the champions who would be getting a VU soon (Cho'gath)
I'm pretty sure a woman like MF would rather kill herself than go out in public with hair like that, lol.
ioi Im so sad right now....like I think riot hates MF.

Im not sure, but something about her Arcade skin is telling me that a possible Model Update is closer than we think. The Arcade skin looks like it was made from a newer model, similar to how Omega Squad Teemo got a new model.
http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/226/3/1/arcade_missfortune_t_by_sstrikerr-d7v4y08.png
http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140804002402/leagueoflegends/images/1/16/Miss_Fortune_Render.png

Its probably the hair that needs the most work.
